dc:title: It was a Good Dinner
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes what it takes to run a food line three times a day. Tells of the bills that pile up and the donations which keep the line going. Hundreds are fed daily, and there always seems to be just enough.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 74 1940-08-23 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
